exam.question: Every man in this country has the right to live where he wants to, ______ the color of his skin.

answer.explain: regardless of：  无论， 不管。句意：  这个国家的每个人都有权生活在他想生活的地方， 不管他的肤色如何。with the exception of：  除…以外； in the light of：  根据， 依据； by virtue of：  依靠， 凭借， 由于。

sentences.sContent: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.sCn: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

sentences.sContent: ...Many of these penalties are imposed regardless of the seriousness of the offense or the person's individual circumstances...
...regardless of whether it's a new one or not...
...but- regardless of whether it is or isn't - we won't do much about it...
